TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RPScreenRecorderDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidChangeAvailability (this ReplayKit.IRPScreenRecorderDelegate This, ReplayKit.RPScreenRecorder screenRecorder);
.method public static hidebysig void DidChangeAvailability(class ReplayKit.IRPScreenRecorderDelegate This, class ReplayKit.RPScreenRecorder screenRecorder) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
Docs.summary: Method that is called when the availability status changes.

Docs.summary: Developers should not use this deprecated method. Developers should use 'DidStopRecording(RPScreenRecorder,RPPreviewViewController,NSError)' instead.
